item.title: Meme Stock Fever Is Spreading Like It’s 2021 With Kohl’s Soaring
item.description: Four years after WallStreetBets ushered in a new trading era, retail investors are piling into heavily shorted companies like Opendoor and Kohl’s.

item.title: Kohl’s Shares Surge as Retailer Gets Meme Treatment
item.description: Kohl’s Corp. shares jumped as much as 105% in early trading Tuesday, the largest one-day jump on record, minting it as the newest meme stock, amid an influx of mentions by retail traders on social med
